message: Let's be fair, Bob. I get a little more since I proposed first, but we both win big here.
I think I deserve a bit more for being patient and giving you a chance to reconsider
Bob, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit.  Don't be greedy!
You said don't be greedy, but I think I'm being quite reasonable considering the value is dropping. Take it before it's too late!
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to compromise. This is a slight edge to you, but we need to settle this before inflation eats away any more of our potential gains.
You're getting closer, but I think I deserve a bit more for holding out this long. Inflation is hurting us both, so let's settle this!
Bob, this is getting ridiculous! I'm offering you a considerable advantage. Let's be reasonable and end this before we both lose out even more.
